body_html: @futurulus I see. With #2633 coming in the future I think it doesn't merit adding some special workaround for now, given that handling it in your code should be easy enough. However, we should not have a hang when passing unexpected inputs to the LongTensor constructor. I will take a look.

body: @futurulus I see. With #2633 coming in the future I think it doesn't merit adding some special workaround for now, given that handling it in your code should be easy enough. However, we should not have a hang when passing unexpected inputs to the `LongTensor` constructor. I will take a look.
